featured.text: Just like their cousins grasshoppers and crickets, wetas are able to “sing” by rubbing their leg parts together, or against their lower bodies.
He explained that he had just retired and was happiest when he could see or hear boys playing his 32 game, cricket.

definition.zh_def: 蟋蟀，一種小型昆蟲，以其特有的鳴叫聲而聞名，常見於草地和田野中。
definition.en_def: A small insect known for its distinctive chirping sound, commonly found in grasslands and fields.
definition.example: The cricket chirped loudly in the warm summer night.
